app_name.description: Specifies the group name or application name.

domain_name.description: Specifies the channel streaming domain name.

language_code_control.description: Specifies the language code control configuration.

name.description: Specifies the name of the audio output configuration.

block.description: Specifies the description of the audio output configuration.

playlist_window_seconds.description: Specifies the window length of the channel live broadcast return shard.

segment_duration_seconds.description: Specifies the duration of the channel output segment.

resource_id.description: Specifies the customer-generated DRM content ID.

speke_version.description: Specifies the DRM spec version number.

system_ids.description: Specifies the system ID enumeration values.

url.description: Specifies the DRM address of the key.

urn.description: Specifies the URN of the function graph.

key.description: Specifies the key field name in the request header.

value.description: Specifies the value corresponding to the key in the request header.

block.description: Specifies the authentication information that needs to be added to the DRM request header.
Specifies the recording and playback related configuration.

back_time.description: Specifies the time shift duration field name.

key.description: Specifies the key used for bitrate filtering in streaming URLs.

segment_duration_seconds.description: Specifies the duration of the channel output segment.

Specifies the recording and playback related configuration.

back_time.description: Specifies the time shift duration field name.

key.description: Specifies the key used for bitrate filtering in streaming URLs.

ip_whitelist.description: Specifies the IP whitelist when protocol is **SRT_PUSH**.

max_bandwidth_limit.description:
Specifies the maximum bandwidth that needs to be configured when the inbound protocol is
**HLS_PULL**.

scte35_source.description: Specifies the advertisement scte35 signal source.

name.description: Specifies the name of the audio selector.

group_id.description: Specifies the HLS audio selector gid.

name.description: Specifies the HLS audio selector name.

input_loss_threshold_msec.description: Specifies the duration threshold of inflow stop.

block.description:
Specifies the configuration of switching between primary and backup audio and video
stream URLs.

backup_urls.description: Specifies the list of backup stream addresses.

bitrate_for3u8.description: Specifies whether to use bitrate to fix the bitrate.

height.description: Specifies the resolution corresponds to the high value.

latency.description: Specifies the streaming delay when the channel type is **SRT_PULL**.

passphrase.description: Specifies the encrypted information when the protocol is **SRT_PUSH**.

stream_id.description: Specifies the stream ID of the stream pull address when the channel type is **SRT_PULL**.

url.description: Specifies the channel source stream URL.

width.description: Specifies the resolution corresponds to the width value.

backup_urls.description: Specifies the list of backup stream addresses.

bitrate_for3u8.description: Specifies whether to use bitrate to fix the bitrate.

enable_snapshot.description: Specifies whether to use this stream to take screenshots.

height.description: Specifies the resolution corresponds to the high value.

latency.description: Specifies the streaming delay when the channel type is **SRT_PULL**.

passphrase.description: Specifies the encrypted information when the protocol is **SRT_PUSH**.

stream_id.description: Specifies the stream ID of the stream pull address when the channel type is **SRT_PULL**.

url.description: Specifies the channel source stream URL, used for external streaming.

width.description: Specifies the resolution corresponds to the width value.

block.description: Specifies the channel main source stream information.

rollingbuffer_duration.description: Specifies the maximum playback recording time.

block.description: Specifies the configuration for replaying a recording.
